title: Special Delivery
description: Fans of the McIntyre Security Bodyguard Series will love this new installment. Many of your favorite characters return to celebrate the birth of a new family member. Shane and Beth are expecting their second child, and their family and friends are here to celebrate the big event with them. Enjoy first-hand point-of-view chapters from lots of characters in this fun and surprising family reunion book.
author: April  Wilson
